query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_entries, SUM(CAST(quantity AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_quantity
FROM consumption c
JOIN products p ON c.productId = p.id
WHERE p.name = 'Brobergs Arcadia';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4FysZ9MrVV6QjYg.root --database EyQJop6MbQkDXkB9byGYLR --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_entries, SUM(CAST(quantity AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_quantity
FROM consumption c
JOIN products p ON c.productId = p.id
WHERE p.name = 'Brobergs Arcadia';
